form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF STAY OF NONQUOTA STUDENT, Form I-535

full_text: Form I-535 Form approved. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Budget Bureau No. 48-R067.1. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Approval expires March 31, 1949. (Rov. 8-10-47) APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF STAY OF NONQUOTA STUDENT NOTE.-Application for extension shall be made on this form to the district director of the immigration district in which the institution which the student is attending is located. This application shall be submitted approximately 30 days prior to the expiration of the period for which admitted or to which admission has been extended. This application must be accompanied by the applicant's passport and any visitor's permit (Form I-94) issued to him when he was admitted to the United States. The passport and permit will be returned. File No. 0900/33210 My name is MAOLING LIU My age is 46 years. My place of birth is SHOUKUANG-hsien SHANTUNG 4/13/04 CHINA (City or town) (Province) (State) I am a citizen or subject of CHINA (Country) My residence in the United States is 630 LINCOLN ST. NE. MPLS. MINN (Street and number) (City or town) (State) My foreign residence is HUANG-CHIA-YA0-SHUI SHOUKUANG SHANTUNG CHINA (Street) (City or town) (Province) (State) relative in the United States is THELMA B, Liu WIFE My reference (Name) (Relationship) permanent address 630 LINCOLN ST.N.E. MPLS. (Country) (City or town) I was admitted as a nonquota immigrant under Section 4 (e) of the Immigration Act of 1924 at (Port of SAN FRANCISCO , by SS GENERAL GORDON , on the 1st day of entry) (Name of vessel or railroad) Feb , 1947, for a temporary period of Two YEARS The serial number of my visitor's permit is 1300/47068 My alien enemy registration number is I have secured 2 extensions, the last extension to expire on Oct 7 - 1950 (Number) (Month) (Day) (Year) Since admission to the United States I have attended the following schools in day classes for the period stated: UNIVERSITY OF MINN APRIL 1947 DATE (School) (From) (To) (prints (School) (From) (To) (School) (From) (To) 16-53706-1 USAG ewbj0AGq
